instructions:
Peel and core the apples; then slice in 3/8 inch rings. Combine above liquids and marinate apple slices for
at least 2 hours.

BATTER
2 egg yokes
1/3 cup water
1/3 cup evaporated milk
1 tbsp rum and brandy mixture
1 tbsp melted butter
1 cup all purpose flour
1/4 tsp salt
2 tbsp sugar
2 egg whites and 1/8 tsp salt

Combine and beat egg yolks, water and milk; add and beat liquor and butter. Sift flour, measure 1 cup,
add salt and sugar and resift. Stir flour into liquid mixture; set aside. Beat egg whites and salt until stiff.
Fold gently into batter. Do not stir.

Drain apple slices, dip in batter and deep fry in 380 degree deep fat *(425 degree for electric skillet)* or
until delicate brown. Drain on paper towels; do not stack. Have powdered sugar or cinnamon sugar
available. Great with country sausage. May be wrapped in foil and frozen. If frozen, place on cookie sheet
and heat in 425 F oven for 10 minutes or until fat bubbles around edges.
name: Apple Fritters
